articles.author: Derek Strickland
articles.title: Microsoft may abandon Activision merger if federal judge grants FTC request - TweakTown
articles.description: Microsoft and Activision have indicated that they may abandon their proposed $68.7 billion merger if federal courts grant FTC a preliminary injunction.
articles.content:
Microsoft legal counsel suggests that the company could abandon the $68.7 billion merger with Activision if federal courts grants the FTC's request for a preliminary injunction.
The fate of the Micr… [+3110 chars]
